text:
The sad thing about an empty environment variable, is you cannot set it in Windows cmd, since setting the variable as `""` is the same as deleting the variable:
```C:\Users\simon>:: show all variables using set
C:\Users\simon>set
...
USERPROFILE=C:\Users\simon
VBOX_MSI_INSTALL_PATH=C:\Program Files\Oracle\VirtualBox\
windir=C:\Windows

C:\Users\simon>set "zzz=something"

C:\Users\simon>set
...
USERPROFILE=C:\Users\simon
VBOX_MSI_INSTALL_PATH=C:\Program Files\Oracle\VirtualBox\
windir=C:\Windows
zzz=something

C:\Users\simon>set "zzz="

C:\Users\simon>set
...
USERPROFILE=C:\Users\simon
VBOX_MSI_INSTALL_PATH=C:\Program Files\Oracle\VirtualBox\
windir=C:\Windows```
